title: Lewis wins at Soã Paulo
subtitle: Soã Paulo GP
text: Lot's of bad luck came to Hamilton's way this race weekend in Brazil. Hamilton picked up a 5 place grid penalty for changing his engine but that wasn't everything. He got caught with an illegal rear wing wherefor he had to start the sprint race from P20. After all that he still managed to win the race.

title: Logan Sargeant to make F2 Debut
subtitle: Williams Driver Academy
text: Williams junior Logan Sargeant will make his Formula 2 debut with HWA RACELAB in Saudi Arabia, stepping up on the back of three seasons in Formula 3

title: Sir Frank Williams dies
subtitle: Williams
text: Sir Frank Williams, the longest serving Team Principal Formula 1 has ever seen, has died at the age of 79.

title: F1 renews deal with Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya
subtitle: Spanish GP
text: Formula 1 has renewed it's deal with Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya, in a move that will keep the Spanish Grand Prix at the track until 2026.

title: Vettel and Schumacher team up in 2022 Race of Champions
subtitle: Race of Champions
text: Four-time world champion Sebastian Vettel and Haas rookie Mick Schumacher, son of Micheal Schumacher, will compete for Team Germany in the 2022 Race of Champions thats takes place in Sweden on February 5-6 2022
